text: tatha (he nabee!) jab aapake paas ve log aayen, jo hamaaree aayaton (quraan) par eemaan laaye hain, to aap kahen ki tum[1] par salaam (shaanti) hai. allaah ne apane oopar daya anivaary kar lee hai ki tumamen se jo bhee agyaanata ke kaaran, koee kukarm kar lega, phir usake pashchaat tauba (kshama yaachana) kar lega aur apana sudhaar kar lega, to nihsandeh allaah ati kshamaasheel dayaavaan hai
